Html:
Hi,

I have a strange problem when i try to read a xlsx file:

I can't read well the cells having only one character in. If there is only one character, the cell's value that is extracted is a empty string, if, instead, there is a normal string, the cell's value is extracted correctly.

I have no idea how to solve this problem.

Can someone halp me?

This problem is related to Workitems 14260 & 14233 - Setting cell values to one char strings & Trouble reading one character string, and has been fixed in the latest SVN code. A fix is provided by gorfou and described in the work item comments.
